question_text:
Consider the following set of processes, with the length of the CPU burst given in milliseconds:

2.The processes are assumed to have arrived at the ready queue in the order P1, P2, P3, P4, P5, all at time 0. Answer the questions using the following scheduling algorithms: shortest-job-first (SJF), and round-robin (RR, with quantum=2).

(1) What is the waiting time of each process for each of the scheduling algorithms? (5%)
